attributes.additional_details: STOP Fathers suffering the sexist discrimination from the Other parent. CMS (child maintenance service) demanding payments without background facts or Health being a priority,  no legal aid for fathers who have not chosen to NOT see their children, If the mother has decided out of spite to ban the father from contact that mother should not be receiving help from CMS. Fathers need more, Theres no justice in the system to make sure that the alienation and bullying against the father stops!
attributes.background: Give good fathers Justice, Stop alienation and Sexism. Help good fathers Get access to the children they Love.
